creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon, Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his Father

texts.textentryhtml: Jean Paul Richter (1847-1937); Purchased for Henry White Cannon (1850-1934) after 1914; by descent to his son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935.
